queries.query_string: DROP USER IF EXISTS 'grant_giver'@'%'; DROP USER IF EXISTS 'grant_receiver'@'%'; DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS grant_test_db
queries.query_description: Ensures clean state by removing any leftover objects from previous failed runs

queries.query_string: CREATE DATABASE grant_test_db;  CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_1 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_2 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_3 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_4 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_5 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100))
queries.query_description: Creates test database and 25 objects (tables) for GRANT testing

queries.query_string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_6 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_7 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_8 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_9 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_10 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100))
queries.query_description: Creates remaining 20 objects for massive grant spike

queries.query_string: CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS 'grant_giver'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'GrantGiver123'; CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS 'grant_receiver'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'GrantReceiver123'; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON grant_test_db.* TO 'grant_giver'@'%' WITH GRANT OPTION; FLUSH PRIVILEGES
GRANT SELECT ON object_1 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES
queries.query_description: Hour 1 baseline - Grant SELECT on object_1

queries.query_string: GRANT SELECT ON object_5 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON object_6 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON object_7 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON object_8 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON object_9 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON object_10 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES
queries.query_usecase: ANOMALY SPIKE - Massive GRANT on 21 Objects
queries.query_description: HOUR 5 ANOMALY: Grant SELECT on 21 objects simultaneously - massive privilege escalation
